trans-unit.source: An activity that executes all child activities simultaneously and asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 以异步方式同时执行所有子活动的活动。

trans-unit.source: A Parallel activity operates by simultaneously scheduling each <xref:System.Activities.Activity> in its <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A> collection at the start.
trans-unit.target: 并行活动的运行方式同时安排每<xref:System.Activities.Activity>中其<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A>开始时的集合。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Activity>

trans-unit.source: It completes when all of its <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A> complete or when its <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.CompletionCondition%2A> property evaluates to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它完成时的所有其<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A>完成时，或者当其<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.CompletionCondition%2A>属性计算结果为`true`。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.CompletionCondition%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A>

trans-unit.source: While all the <xref:System.Activities.Activity> objects run asynchronously, they do not execute on separate threads, so each successive activity only executes when the previously scheduled activity completes or goes idle.
trans-unit.target: 尽管所有<xref:System.Activities.Activity>对象以异步方式运行，因此每个后续活动才会执行先前安排的活动完成或进入空闲状态时不执行在单独线程上执行它们。</xref:System.Activities.Activity>

trans-unit.source: If none of the child activities of this activity go idle, this activity execute in the same way that a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> activity does.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何子活动的此活动进入空闲状态，此活动将执行在相同的方式<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>活动。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Parallel"></xref> activity.
The child elements to be executed in parallel.
If this property evaluates to `true`, then the other scheduled elements in the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A> collection are canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的计算结果为`true`，然后中的其他计划的元素<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A>集合会取消。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, all <xref:System.Activities.Activity> objects in the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A> collection execute until completion.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性未设置，所有<xref:System.Activities.Activity>中的对象<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A>集合执行，直至完成为止。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel.Branches%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Activity>
